name: yea boi
description:
co-op game in progress! inspired by yea boi meme

PLAYER ONE — dodge squares with WASD

PLAYER TWO — left (black) and right (white) click to change tile color, enemy squares gain health while on tiles closer to their color and lose health while on tiles not close to their color*

*that is, dark grey gains health on black and loses health on while tiles whereas light grey gains health on white and loses health and black tiles
